title: Fan Artist Feature - Rachel J Corey

replies.body: I feel like I laughed harder than I should have at that fed soraka comic. I love your art style, Rachel.
You're not the only one! I choked on my water laughing at it just now.
Hey can you spin the idea of making a Day of The Dead thresh to your design team =D? Pretty sure he and El tigre Braum would have some funny conversations XD.
Toa of Death huh? Lucky for you i lost the ignika mask.
heheh yeah it was used to revive your sorry ass then you go ahead and sacrifice yourself to kill Makuta and bring back life to Spherus Magna(probably spelled that wrong).
MY CHILD HOOD. <3 i love you now for eternity...i still have bionicles....in a box...in my closet...totally not on a shelf in my room >.>...<.<
I collected the heck out of those things when I was younger. I still have the Light guy and his bike.
Takanuva?
Shout out to my bro, Matoro for waking me up. He was the real MVP. RIP Toa Matoro
Long live Bionicle!
Kinda sad that it was just a toy line/oddly well drawn comic strip and never really became a thing outside of the lego community. I myself thought that conceptually bionicle had a lot to work with.
Raka is new Cho 'Gath! Oh... let's give her Gnarbecue...
That day of the Dead Thresh looks amazing. It would be an awesome skin if it were in the game
Thanks!! :D I think it would be amazing to have a whole set of Day of the Dead skins!! So many champs it could work well with!!
I would definitely buy into that. I want to see an angry Mariachi Sion now =)

Mariachi {{champion:14}} ?!?!
Rito.... Shut up.... and take my money
Mariachi Mordekaiser GIVE TO MEEEEEEEEEE
Lol silly Fools, he's in a heavy metal band. No time for acoustics.

Hey guys! I'll be in this thread today answering questions as I'm able while I'm at work. :D It's always such a joy to talk with the community about lore and comics and stuff!!!! 

Also, here's the unfinished Talon comic I mentioned in the article, where he first meets Noxian General DuCouteau. I’m not planning on finishing it or adding text, but if you’re interested in seeing all of it it’s here: (21 pages)

http://imgur.com/a/HYXoG

(the big motivator for me in this comic was Talon making an offhanded rude comment about Kat (”crazy broad” or the like) and DuCouteau smacking him across the face for talking crap about his sweet little daughter :D)
Sweet Little Daughter... I BEG TO DIFFER!!!
All dads believe that though! :p

Oh man, I knew your art looked familiar. I found that Viktor/Jayce comic what feels like ages ago and fell in love. I'm so glad to have found the source!
Also, PLEASE tell me that is Saint Shyv is drawing there. 
Based.
It sure is! http://i.imgur.com/FvqJl7k.jpg
LOL I love how jayce is showing viktor a pic he drew of him hitting him with his hammer while Viktor is drawing a robot. Such a cute little scene lol
Holy heck Kirrys! I love seeing your work (I already told you on tumblr more than once uwu) But man you're art just inspires me!
YAY KIRRY!! <3 Keep being awesome girl!

Loving your job Rachel, congratulations and keep it up ^^

.... dat Draven tho. I will save it, print it and bury it in a safe place in case of extreme needs.
That is a worldchanger.

EDIT: in case somebody does not understand, yes i realize Rachel is not OP
Thank you. :D It is quite arousing isn't it.
your knowledge of body and facial expression really shines through! your work is quick and expressive without looking rushed and i'm a fan! can't wait to see where you go next!
Thanks so much!! :D That is always something I've tried to shoot for above all else! Liveliness really connects with an audience, I think!

Suddenly I need a Slumber Party Diana skin.

On a different note, I absolutely adore this woman's League art! Her Diana comic is probably my single favorite piece of fan art anywhere, and I'm always pleased to find a little more of her work that I had missed on my first pass at her galleries. I would love to see her (get paid to) write more comics about the lore of Runeterra and its characters.
What are you waiting for Riot, just hire her to do lore comics for the games world. Im sure she is more than qualified for that.

Well I mean she constantly asks for Riot to her work as seen and commonly mentioned on her tumblr and created the fan made Viktor and Jayce comic, along with a few other lore comics. I can't see a reason why not personally, she really needs it.
It would be nice to do official Riot comics! But I'm busy working on our game "Wayward" for the next year or two. ^_^ And it'll be a runaway success and we'll get to make Wayward 2 and 3, of course.

I'm probably going to sound like the anti-fun police here, but just an fyi, the draven comic is listed as "Adult Content" according to the link you posted. If it's SFW you may wish to add an little bit of extra text letting people know that it is.
Bikini Draven, as stated (or is that an edit?)
That's an edit. Thanks btw for letting people know what it is and therefore safe for all ages.

Thanks for the suggestion Maliginant! =)
Even though it's a relatively safe image, there's still a lot of {{champion:119}} there to behold. A warning is always nice, haha!

Is it just me or has does it feel like its been years since a new champ came out? and then there was that one time where it was {{champion:150}}  that came out, and right after {{champion:150}}   was {{champion:429}}  and then {{champion:14}}  rework with {{champion:421}}  at the last that came out? Im just wondering when the next new champ is coming out. I think a good idea would be a brother of {{champion:56}} kinda like a light kinda champ instead of a shadow?

Nocturne has no brother. But he was once part of a brotherHOOD

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NcW94x-lvPU](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NcW94x-lvPU)
wow sounds so true....i believe noc is shen's nightmare

But Nocturne's lore has to be rewritten because of the removal of the IoW, without which Nocturne has no reason to exist.  Remember, he spawned from a malfunctioning nexus on the twisted treeline when a summoner passed by.
Fantastic work! The colors are so lively and fun to look at. WP Rachel! :D
Can we talk about that Thresh skin idea though? I'd play the heck outta that.
Can we talk about that Thresh skin idea though? I'd play the heck outta that.
Who's that person Shyvana was drawing in the crayon picture? It's freaking adorable, by the way.
I WANT CINCO DE MAYO/DAY OF THE DEAD SKIN FOR THRESH@Riot!
Your {{champion:16}} picture is definitely one of the funniest fan art pictures I've seen!
.....why don't we already have a Corki riding a Corgi?!
Her Jayce always looks like Handsome Jack.
